Sentencas: The development of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) for powering vehicles requires high power densities.
Titulo: Influence of Radial Flows on Power Density and Gas Stream Pressure Drop of Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The radial flows generated by the insert structures in SOFC fuel channels could improve the power density by facilitating the fuel to enter the porous anode for electrochemical reactions.
Titulo: Influence of Radial Flows on Power Density and Gas Stream Pressure Drop of Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In this paper, we developed a 2D axisymmetric numerical model to examine the influence of a convergent conical ring insert on the flow and mass transfer characteristics in a tubular SOFC.
Titulo: Influence of Radial Flows on Power Density and Gas Stream Pressure Drop of Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The mass transfer conductance of fuel was analyzed and proposed to quantify the performance of different insert designs.
Titulo: Influence of Radial Flows on Power Density and Gas Stream Pressure Drop of Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The effects of the radius and offset angle of the convergent conical ring insert were examined and analyzed.
Titulo: Influence of Radial Flows on Power Density and Gas Stream Pressure Drop of Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: We demonstrate that increasing the insert radius could increase the fuel mass transfer conductance and effectively improve the net output power of the tubular SOFC by 12% while the offset angle of the inserts exhibits a negligible impact on the fuel mass transfer conductance.
Titulo: Influence of Radial Flows on Power Density and Gas Stream Pressure Drop of Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Increasing the offset angle could help reduce the gas-phase pressure drop in fuel channels by 42%.
Titulo: Influence of Radial Flows on Power Density and Gas Stream Pressure Drop of Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The present study helps improve our understanding of the relationship between fuel mass transfer conductance and electrochemical reactions.
Titulo: Influence of Radial Flows on Power Density and Gas Stream Pressure Drop of Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: It also proposes channel design methods based on mass transfer conductance for high-power-density solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Influence of Radial Flows on Power Density and Gas Stream Pressure Drop of Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
